author: depasse
body:
#### PR description:

ECAL : for appending EcalTimeCalibConstants tags with new payloads : tool to create sqlite files from raw xxx.dat or xxx.xml files.

#### PR validation:

Tested (cmsRun updateTimeCalib.py) in CMSSW_13 and 14_0_5 with xxx.dat and xxx.xml source files  : same payloads generated (hashes).
Comments about const suggestion in #PR 44713 don't work, after many attempts.  Still compilation errors.  N.B. All other ...Handler.cc of CondTools/Ecal/src have the same structure , without const.
title: ECAL : Tool to create sqlite files for DB
